sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>building</radical> that has a <radical>bully</radical> will <kanji>isolate</kanji> itself. Building have feelings like people, you know.
meaningInfo: Picture a single building, isolated from the rest of the city and those mean, bully buildings that live there.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>isolate</kanji>d building only has one companion, and it's the <reading>cock</reading> (<ja>かく</ja>) that lives inside of it.
readingInfo: Picture the sun rising behind an isolated building. A cock lets out a cry from the roof. It's a sad and lonely scene.
